start.message: 🤖ChatsTodo - Your Virtual Assistant Commands: /connect - Link to your Chatstodo account! /summary - Get a summary, tasks and events of your group chats that you are tracking! /track - Use this in a group that I am in to start tracking it. /viewGroups - Get a list of groups that you are tracking. /deleteGroups - Stop tracking a group. /help - For any questions or assistance

help.message:
Need some guidance? Here you can learn how to use all the features I offer, including

/summary - viewing summaries, tasks and events of your groups
/feedbacks - provide feedbacks here
/track - Use this in a group that I am in to start tracking it (only in groups).
/viewGroups - Get a list of groups that you are tracking.
/deleteGroups - Stop tracking a group.

Just type a command!
help.description: Provides help on how to use the bot effectively.

summary.message: Interested in a quick glance at what's going on? I'll bring up a summary, actionables and events of the latest discussions
summary.description: Displays a summary, actionables and events of the latest discussions
